Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.gameRoom

Class GeneralGameRoom

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.gameRoom.GeneralGameRoom
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameRoom
public abstract class GeneralGameRoom
extends java.lang.Object
This class model the concept of a waiting room during the connection phase and the game room when the match starts.
Author:
AndreaAltomare
